qas.question: What percent of 5 year olds or older speak English?
What percent of 5 year olds or older speak Spanish?
What is the total over 5's that speak another language than English?

context: As of 2010[update], <a0_0>79.12%<a0_0/> (1,112,441) of Philadelphia residents age 5 and older spoke English at home as a primary language, while <a1_0>9.72%<a1_0/> (136,688) spoke Spanish, 1.64% (23,075) Chinese, 0.89% (12,499) Vietnamese, 0.77% (10,885) Russian, 0.66% (9,240) French, 0.61% (8,639) other Asian languages, 0.58% (8,217) African languages, 0.56% (7,933) Cambodian (Mon-Khmer), and Italian was spoken as a main language by 0.55% (7,773) of the population over the age of five. In total, <a2_0>20.88%<a2_0/> (293,544) of Philadelphia's population age 5 and older spoke a mother language other than English.
